channel.title: Looking for Forum Testers
channel.description:
I'm looking for a single tester to test my forum out for any flaws or glitches that occur or can be abused.
Pretty much, I'm asking you to try and abuse the forum, with no cracks or whatever. Just any simple mistakes I may have made while setting up.
No, this isn't a cheap attempt to get members. Before you register, please let me know of the name your going to register under and I can go about setting you in different member groups ect.
Also, I'm looking for someone I can trust, or know well enough to allow certain permissions.
Thanks,
Chris
My forum - www.elitegfx.net

item.title: Looking for Forum Testers
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Mr.Chris:

You need to be really comfortable with SMF and have a good knowledge of it. Are you?

Oh, no lol nevermind then

Read full topic
